name: Super Envision速 Flavor and Texture Modifier
description: A more concentrated extension of the Domino Specialty Ingredient Envision速 co-crystallized flavor and texture modification product line. This unique heat-stable ingredient allows for the use of a full range of carbohydrates to maintain the desired attributes of products, such as moisture retention, mouth feel, and water activity. Due to its higher concentration, Super Envision速 is typically used at <1% in a formulation which achieves desired results in your finished goods at a lower cost. Applications range from light sweet to savory cheese, meat, and vegetable flavors in bakery, confection, nutraceutical, prepared foods, soups, snacks, and sauces, making Super Envision速 an extremely versatile and effective ingredient.
